Class IngestExternalConfiguration

java.lang.Object
fr.gouv.vitam.common.server.application.configuration.DefaultVitamApplicationConfiguration
fr.gouv.vitam.ingest.external.common.config.IngestExternalConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
VitamApplicationConfiguration, VitamApplicationConfigurationInterface
public class IngestExternalConfiguration extends DefaultVitamApplicationConfiguration
IngestExternalConfiguration contains access informations of ingest
